RT ar.io network The @developer_dao gateway is setting a gold standard for future community operated gateways 🫡🐘 187 consecutive days of passed epochs 🤯 99.5% uptime 📈 Top 5 staked gateway in the Network 🔝 43 delegated stakers 🤝

entry.summary: RT Miral Suthar I've been exploring @fuel_network and its UTXO model, which is more efficient for state growth but can be tricky to grasp. So, I built a visualizer to simplify understanding UTXO-based transaction flows!

entry.title: RT marc | wolovim.eth 🐼: new post ⚡ an upgrade to real-time event subscriptions using web3py:
entry.summary:
RT marc | wolovim.eth 🐼 new post ⚡ an upgrade to real-time event subscriptions using web3py:
EF Python Team: ✨ web3py v7.7.0 released! ✨ in addition to performance improvements and bug fixes, two new features of note: 1️⃣ a shiny new subscription manager 2️⃣ a contract event `topic` property to make log filtering easier ➡️ event subscriptions explained: https://snakecharmers.ethereum.org/subscriptions/
